snippet: Amherst pulled away late to beat Mary Hardin-Baylor in Atlanta and win its second Division III national championship.
abstract: Amherst beats Mary Hardin-Baylor to win its second Division III men's college baskeball national championship; Drury beats Metro State-Denver for Division II men's title.
lead_paragraph: Amherst pulled away late to beat Mary Hardin-Baylor in Atlanta and win its second Division III national championship.

headline.seo: Amherst Takes Division III Basketball Title
headline.main: Amherst Takes Division III Basketball Title
